Adventure Guildsman:
Adventurers below level 40 can use the following Support Magic:
Berserker Spirit, level 1 - 300 points.
Might, level 1 - 200 points.
Shield, level 1 - 100 points.
Wind Walk, level 1 - 200 points.
Focus, level 1 - 550 points.
Magic Barrier, level 1 - 300 points.
Death Whisper, level 1 - 650 points.
Guidance, level 1 - 200 points.
Bless Shield, level 1 - 100 points.
Blessed Body, level 1 - 200 points.
Blessed Soul, level 1 - 200 points.
Haste, level 1 - 400 points.
Agility, level 1 - 200 points.
Vampiric Rage, level 1 - 200 points.
Empower, level 1 - 200 points.
Acumen, level 1 - 400 points.
